pageDescription: Web developer Julio Sepia's resume, which shows his experience in web application development, responsive web design and game development.
title: Julio Sepia
subtitle: Web Developer
bio: I'm Julio, a software developer with experience in web applications (desktop/mobile), graphic design and videogames. I'm constantly amazed by the ever-improving capabilities of the web and I enjoy being an early adopter of new technologies. As a front-end specialist, I like to work closely with UX designers and product managers to define and deliver satisfying user experiences.
